name: Dimension Destroyer
description:
After stealing the gun that can kill reality, you have been ambushed by the Interdimensional Police. Defeat them and erase this reality to hide the traces of your crimes.

Keyboard and Mouse Controls

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Look
Space - Jump
Left Mouse - Fire
Scroll Wheel - Change Weapon
Escape - Pause

Gamepad Controls

Left Stick - Movement
Right Stick - Look
South Button - Jump
Right Trigger - Fire
Shoulder Buttons - Change Weapon
Start - Pause

Used Assets
